content: इद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [इंध्-क्त] {@--1@} Kindled, lighted; <ls>Mv. 1. 53</ls>; क्रोध° <ls>Ratn. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Mu. 1. 2</ls>; °राग <ls>Ś. 7. 16</ls> whose glow or red colour has just broken out. {@--2@} Shining, glowing, blazing, bright; <ls>Ki. 2. 59</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 63</ls>; °बोधैः <ls>Bk. 1. 5</ls> (पटुबुद्धिभिः) sharp. {@--3@} Clean, clear. {@--4@} Wonderful. {@--5@} Obeyed, unresisted (as order); °शासनः <ls>Ki. 1. 22</ls> --द्धं {@--1@} Sunshine, heat. {@--2@} Refulgence, splendour. {@--3@} Wonder.
